data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Sham Shui Po, Hong Kong. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sham Shui Po, Hong Kong
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Sham Shui Po, Hong Kong from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.section_summary: On average, 30 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Sham Shui Po, Hong Kong.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 22,370 believers living in the state of Sham Shui Po. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Sham Shui Po, Hong Kong.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 22,370 believers in the state of Sham Shui Po with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Sham Shui Po who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Sham Shui Po words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."
